sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO RI020NM ( CENTER_CD ,BU_CD ,INBOUND_DATE ,INBOUND_NO INOUT_CD INBOUND_STATE CUST_CD DELIVERY_CD RDELIVERY_CD CAR_CD PLANED_DATETIME LOCATION_ID_CNT CARRIER_CD REFUND_WB_NO REFUND_PRICE_TYPE REFUND_SHIP_PRICE REFUND_SHIP_PRICE_CD RETURN_STATUS REMARK1 ENTRY_USER_ID ,ENTRY_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #P_CENTER_CD# ,#P_BU_CD# ,#P_INBOUND_DATE# ,#P_INBOUND_NO# #P_INOUT_CD# #P_INBOUND_STATE# #P_CUST_CD# #P_DELIVERY_CD# #P_RDELIVERY_CD# #P_CAR_CD# TO_DATE(#P_PLANED_DATETIME#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') #P_LOCATION_ID_CNT# #P_CARRIER_CD# #P_REFUND_WB_NO# #P_REFUND_PRICE_TYPE# #P_REFUND_SHIP_PRICE# #P_REFUND_SHIP_PRICE_CD# #P_RETURN_STATUS# #P_REMARK1# #P_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE
)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RI020NM SET INOUT_CD = #P_INOUT_CD# INBOUND_STATE = #P_INBOUND_STATE# CUST_CD = #P_CUST_CD# DELIVERY_CD = #P_DELIVERY_CD# RDELIVERY_CD = #P_RDELIVERY_CD# CAR_CD = #P_CAR_CD# PLANED_DATETIME = TO_DATE(#P_PLANED_DATETIME#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LOCATION_ID_CNT = #P_LOCATION_ID_CNT# CARRIER_CD = #P_CARRIER_CD# REFUND_WB_NO = #P_REFUND_WB_NO# REFUND_PRICE_TYPE = #P_REFUND_PRICE_TYPE# REFUND_SHIP_PRICE = #P_REFUND_SHIP_PRICE# REFUND_SHIP_PRICE_CD = #P_REFUND_SHIP_PRICE_CD# RETURN_STATUS = #P_RETURN_STATUS# REMARK1 = #P_REMARK1# ENTRY_USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# ,ENTRY_DATETIME = SYSDATE
WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM RI020NM WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RI020ND ( CENTER_CD ,BU_CD ,INBOUND_DATE ,INBOUND_NO ,LINE_NO INBOUND_STATE BRAND_CD ITEM_CD ITEM_STATE ITEM_LOT VALID_DATE BATCH_NO ORDER_QTY ENTRY_QTY CONFIRM_QTY PUTAWAY_QTY BUY_PRICE DC_PRICE APPLY_PRICE BUY_AMT VAT_YN VAT_AMT DC_AMT TOTAL_AMT ORDER_DATE ORDER_NO ORDER_LINE_NO DEAL_ID OPTION_ID OPTION_QTY BU_DATE BU_NO BU_LINE_NO BU_KEY RETURN_DIV RETURN_COMMENT UNPAID_DIV UNPAID_COMMENT REMARK1 IF_DEAL_ID IF_OPTION_ID RETURN_TEXT ENTRY_USER_ID ,ENTRY_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #P_CENTER_CD# ,#P_BU_CD# ,#P_INBOUND_DATE# ,#P_INBOUND_NO# ,#P_LINE_NO# #P_INBOUND_STATE# #P_BRAND_CD# #P_ITEM_CD# #P_ITEM_STATE# #P_ITEM_LOT# #P_VALID_DATE# #P_BATCH_NO# #P_ORDER_QTY# #P_ENTRY_QTY# #P_CONFIRM_QTY# #P_PUTAWAY_QTY# #P_BUY_PRICE# #P_DC_PRICE# #P_APPLY_PRICE# #P_BUY_AMT# #P_VAT_YN# #P_VAT_AMT# #P_DC_AMT# #P_TOTAL_AMT# #P_ORDER_DATE# #P_ORDER_NO# #P_ORDER_LINE_NO# #P_DEAL_ID# #P_OPTION_ID# #P_OPTION_QTY# #P_BU_DATE# #P_BU_NO# #P_BU_LINE_NO# #P_BU_KEY# #P_RETURN_DIV# #P_RETURN_COMMENT# #P_UNPAID_DIV# #P_UNPAID_COMMENT# #P_REMARK1# #P_IF_DEAL_ID# #P_IF_OPTION_ID# #P_RETURN_TEXT# #P_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RI020ND SET ENTRY_DATETIME = SYSDATE INBOUND_STATE = #P_INBOUND_STATE# BRAND_CD = #P_BRAND_CD# ITEM_CD = #P_ITEM_CD# ITEM_STATE = #P_ITEM_STATE# ITEM_LOT = #P_ITEM_LOT# VALID_DATE = #P_VALID_DATE# BATCH_NO = #P_BATCH_NO# ORDER_QTY = #P_ORDER_QTY# ENTRY_QTY = #P_ENTRY_QTY# CONFIRM_QTY = #P_CONFIRM_QTY# PUTAWAY_QTY = #P_PUTAWAY_QTY# BUY_PRICE = #P_BUY_PRICE# DC_PRICE = #P_DC_PRICE# APPLY_PRICE = #P_APPLY_PRICE# BUY_AMT = #P_BUY_AMT# VAT_YN = #P_VAT_YN# VAT_AMT = #P_VAT_AMT# DC_AMT = #P_DC_AMT# TOTAL_AMT = #P_TOTAL_AMT# ORDER_DATE = #P_ORDER_DATE# ORDER_NO = #P_ORDER_NO# ORDER_LINE_NO = #P_ORDER_LINE_NO# DEAL_ID = #P_DEAL_ID# OPTION_ID = #P_OPTION_ID# OPTION_QTY = #P_OPTION_QTY# BU_DATE = #P_BU_DATE# BU_NO = #P_BU_NO# BU_LINE_NO = #P_BU_LINE_NO# BU_KEY = #P_BU_KEY# RETURN_DIV = #P_RETURN_DIV# RETURN_COMMENT = #P_RETURN_COMMENT# UNPAID_DIV = #P_UNPAID_DIV# UNPAID_COMMENT = #P_UNPAID_COMMENT# IF_DEAL_ID = #P_IF_DEAL_ID# IF_OPTION_ID = #P_IF_OPTION_ID# RETURN_TEXT = #P_RETURN_TEXT# REMARK1 = #P_REMARK1# ENTRY_USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO# AND LINE_NO = #P_LINE_NO#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM RI020ND WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO# LINE_NO = #P_LINE_NO#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RI030NM SET CENTER_CD = CENTER_CD PUTAWAY_LOCATION_CD = #P_LOCATION_CD# PUTAWAY_LOCATION_CD = #P_PUTAWAY_LOCATION_CD# IN_GRP = #P_IN_GRP# INOUT_CD = #P_INOUT_CD# CUST_CD = #P_CUST_CD# DELIVERY_CD = #P_DELIVERY_CD# BRAND_CD = #P_BRAND_CD# ITEM_CD = #P_ITEM_CD# ITEM_STATE = #P_ITEM_STATE# ITEM_LOT = #P_ITEM_LOT# VALID_DATE = #P_VALID_DATE# BATCH_NO = #P_BATCH_NO# LOCATION_ID = #P_LOCATION_ID# STOCK_ID = #P_STOCK_ID# ENTRY_QTY = #P_ENTRY_QTY# CONFIRM_QTY = #P_CONFIRM_QTY# PUTAWAY_QTY = #P_PUTAWAY_QTY#
INSPECT_YN = #P_INSPECT_YN# INSPECT_USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# ,INSPECT_DATETIME = SYSDATE INSPECT_USER_ID = NULL ,INSPECT_DATETIME = NULL
PUTAWAY_YN = #P_PUTAWAY_YN# PUTAWAY_USER_ID = #P_USER_ID# ,PUTAWAY_DATETIME = SYSDATE PUTAWAY_USER_ID = NULL ,PUTAWAY_DATETIME = NULL
CONFIRM_YN = #P_CONFIRM_YN# WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO# AND LINE_NO = #P_LINE_NO# AND INBOUND_SEQ = #P_INBOUND_SEQ#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RI020PM ( CENTER_CD ,BU_CD ,INBOUND_DATE ,INBOUND_NO ORDERER_CD ORDERER_NM ORDERER_TEL ORDERER_HP ORDERER_EMAIL ORDERER_MSG ORDERER_ZIP_CD ORDERER_ADDR_BASIC ORDERER_ADDR_DETAIL SHIPPER_NM SHIPPER_TEL SHIPPER_HP SHIPPER_ZIP_CD SHIPPER_ADDR_BASIC SHIPPER_ADDR_DETAIL REMARK1 ,REG_USER_ID ,REG_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #P_CENTER_CD# ,#P_BU_CD# ,#P_INBOUND_DATE# ,#P_INBOUND_NO# #P_ORDERER_CD# #P_ORDERER_NM# WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_TEL#) WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_HP#) WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_EMAIL#) #P_ORDERER_MSG# #P_ORDERER_ZIP_CD# WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_ADDR_BASIC#) WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_ADDR_DETAIL#) #P_SHIPPER_NM# WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_TEL#) WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_HP#) #P_SHIPPER_ZIP_CD# WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_ADDR_BASIC#) WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_ADDR_DETAIL#) #P_REMARK1# ,#P_REG_USER_ID# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RI020PM SET ORDERER_CD = #P_ORDERER_CD# ORDERER_NM = #P_ORDERER_NM# ORDERER_TEL = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_TEL#) ORDERER_HP = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_HP#) ORDERER_EMAIL = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_EMAIL#) ORDERER_MSG = #P_ORDERER_MSG# ORDERER_ZIP_CD = #P_ORDERER_ZIP_CD# ORDERER_ADDR_BASIC = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_ADDR_BASIC#) ORDERER_ADDR_DETAIL = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_ORDERER_ADDR_DETAIL#) SHIPPER_NM = #P_SHIPPER_NM# SHIPPER_TEL = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_TEL#) SHIPPER_HP = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_HP#) SHIPPER_ZIP_CD = #P_SHIPPER_ZIP_CD# SHIPPER_ADDR_BASIC = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_ADDR_BASIC#) SHIPPER_ADDR_DETAIL = WF.GET_ENCSTR(#P_SHIPPER_ADDR_DETAIL#) REMARK1 = #P_REMARK1# ,REG_USER_ID = #P_REG_USER_ID# ,REG_DATETIME = SYSDATE WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM RI020PM WHERE CENTER_CD = #P_CENTER_CD# AND BU_CD = #P_BU_CD# AND INBOUND_DATE = #P_INBOUND_DATE# AND INBOUND_NO = #P_INBOUND_NO#
